statements: SELECT * FROM compost_turning_dates;
SELECT batch_id, turn_date FROM compost_turning_dates;
SELECT * FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE batch_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compost_turning_dates ORDER BY turn_date DESC;
SELECT batch_id, mix_date, turn_date FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE mix_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE turn_date > '2022-09-01' ORDER BY turn_date DESC;
SELECT batch_id, mix_date FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE mix_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY mix_date ASC;
SELECT batch_id, turn_date, mix_date FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE batch_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY batch_id;
SELECT * FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE turn_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT batch_id, mix_date FROM compost_turning_dates WHERE mix_date > '2022-03-01' AND batch_id = 2 ORDER BY mix_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches;
SELECT batch_id, turn_date FROM compost_batches ORDER BY turn_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches WHERE batch_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, action, log_date FROM compost_log ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, action, log_date FROM compost_log WHERE action LIKE '%turn%' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches WHERE turn_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_id, mix_date FROM compost_batches WHERE batch_id = 10;
SELECT log_id, action, log_date FROM compost_log WHERE action LIKE '%turn%';
SELECT * FROM compost_batches ORDER BY turn_date DESC;
SELECT l.log_id, b.batch_id, l.action, l.log_date FROM compost_batches b JOIN compost_log l ON b.batch_id = l.batch_id;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches;
SELECT batch_id, batch_date FROM compost_batches WHERE batch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT batch_id, aeration_date FROM compost_batches ORDER BY aeration_date DESC;
SELECT batch_id, batch_date FROM compost_batches WHERE batch_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, turn_date FROM turning_events JOIN compost_batches ON turning_events.batch_id = compost_batches.batch_id;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches ORDER BY batch_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT batch_id, batch_date, aeration_date FROM compost_batches WHERE aeration_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY batch_id;

SELECT c.batch_id, c.batch_date, t.turn_date, m.mix_date FROM compost_batches c INNER JOIN turning_events t ON c.batch_id = t.batch_id INNER JOIN mixing_events m ON c.batch_id = m.batch_id WHERE c.batch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY c.batch_id DESC;
SELECT cb.batch_id, tb.event_id, tb.turn_date FROM compost_batches cb LEFT JOIN turning_events tb ON cb.batch_id = tb.batch_id ORDER BY cb.batch_id, tb.turn_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT c.batch_id, c.batch_date, t.turn_date FROM compost_batches c LEFT JOIN turning_events t ON c.batch_id = t.batch_id WHERE t.turn_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY c.batch_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches;
SELECT batch_name, turn_date FROM compost_batches ORDER BY turn_date DESC;
SELECT batch_id, mix_date, batch_name FROM compost_batches WHERE mix_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, turn_date, notes FROM compost_turning_logs WHERE notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT batch_id, start_date, end_date, frequency FROM compost_aeration_schedule WHERE frequency > 3 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches ORDER BY batch_id DESC;
SELECT batch_name, turn_date FROM compost_batches WHERE turn_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT batch_id, mix_date FROM compost_batches WHERE batch_name LIKE 'Batch%';
SELECT log_id, batch_id, turn_date, notes FROM compost_turning_logs ORDER BY turn_date ASC;
SELECT batch_id, start_date, end_date, frequency FROM compost_aeration_schedule WHERE frequency > 3;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches;
SELECT batch_id, batch_date, mix_date FROM compost_batches ORDER BY batch_date DESC;
SELECT batch_id, batch_date, mix_date FROM compost_batches WHERE mix_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM compost_batches WHERE batch_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT b.batch_id, b.batch_date, l.location_name FROM compost_batches b JOIN batch_locations bl ON b.batch_id = bl.batch_id JOIN compost_locations l ON bl.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT batch_id, batch_date FROM compost_batches ORDER BY batch_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT mix_date, turn_date, batch_id FROM compost_batches WHERE mix_date IS NOT NULL AND turn_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location_name FROM compost_locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM batch_locations WHERE batch_id = 1);
SELECT comment_id, comment FROM batch_comments JOIN compost_batches ON batch_comments.batch_id = compost_batches.batch_id WHERE comment ILIKE '%good%' ORDER BY batch_comments.comment_id;
SELECT material_name, COUNT(material_id) AS material_count FROM compost_materials GROUP BY material_name HAVING COUNT(material_id) > 1 ORDER BY material_count DESC;
